item.description: A very short Executive course playing about 2000 yard total from the tips. Excellent course for the beginner to learn. There are trees lining all the holes and the fairways aren't extremely wide (not that tight either). A couple of holes you have to play over a ravine There are also a couple of long par 3's (over 200 yards).The course is pretty bare bones. You can rent riding carts or pull carts but the course is extremely walkable. Play here to work on all aspects of your game, especially your irons and short game.
item.name: Practice your Golfing Skills at Buena Vista (Hackers)
